amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate regarding the urgent need for increased funding for the Corps of Engineers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 389 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 389 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S4259-4260; text: CR S4259-4260) To express the sense of the Senate regarding the urgent need for increased funding for the Corps of Engineers.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 389 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 389 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Hutchison.
